comment.author: S. Suh Lee
comment.content: I will try to attend. It's Ms. Lee, by the way.

comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: As I sent a mail to you all, our customer has free time only on Thursday. I hope everybody can come to join. Location will be same place at North York( I think... ).

comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: I guess our off line meeting is settled. 한방병원 7pm Thursday. I will send confirmation mail to you guys.

post.content:
The customer has requested for a design review on the screen mockups in http://studygroup.wikispaces.com/sdd.html.

Could Mr. Heo lead/arrange this review?

Also this would be a good opportunity for Mr. Lee (if he could attend) to catch up and understand the work process of the system in preparation for Ruby/Watir testing. Same goes for Nariy for the User Manual development, I think.
post.title: Customer request for UI design review
